name: Zombie Infectonator - Plague And Infect Them All Incremental Tapper
name_original: Zombie Infectonator - Plague And Infect Them All Incremental Tapper
description:
Zombies are already odd by nature. What would happen if Zombies plan to take over the Earth? Find out in Zombie Infectonator!

From the minds that brought you Weed Boss, comes a new game that some how manages to be even crazier and more nonsensical.

One day, Zombies became smarter and started infecting humans, Your role in the game is to infect humans as much as possible by upgrading better, stronger zombies!!

Yes in this game you play against humans!!

Upgrade Zombies to evolve them, discover their most strange, fantastic and visionary forms!
You must have never seen so many mutations and crazy features in other games!

HOW TO PLAY
• Click, Click and Click to make more money!
• More Infections "R" will help you upgrade to better zombies, which will make you even more infections!!
• Alternatively, fiercely tap a zombie to make glitter pops

HIGHLIGHTS
• 20 different types of zombie species to discover
• The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
• Awesome Cool Looking illustrations
• No humans were harmed in the making of this game, only developers and artists

Play with zombie mutations with a head start. Download now and have fun in Zombie Infectonator!

Disclaimer: While this App is completely free to play, some additional content can be purchased for real money in-game. If you do not want to use this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Like our page on Facebook and be the first to know about our upcoming games and updates! http://on.fb.me/1ZD5yzh
